content.question: The allusion to Atlas in line 34 primarily serves to suggest that modern poets

choices.label: claim to feel unworthy of the publicâ€™s praise

content.answer: possess an exaggerated sense of their own importance

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
